data.name: RPGScenery - Tavern Scene
data.detailed_description:
As you step out of the forest, a mouth-watering scent reaches your nostrils. One more step and its source also comes into view, a slightly worn-out building next to the road. In front of it something merrily bubbling in a cauldron. Behind the half-open front door, the sounds of eating and cheering can be heard, no doubt that this is indeed a tavern.

This DLC contains 3 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
